mapper.select: SELECT e.employee_id as employeeId, e.employee_name as employeeName, e.photo as photo, e.position_id as positionId FROM employee_info e WHERE e.account_number_id = (SELECT account_number_id FROM account_number WHERE username = #{username})

SELECT a.account_number_id, a.username, a.password as password, a.islocked FROM employee_info e left join account_number a on e.account_number_id = a.account_number_id where e.employee_id = #{employeeId}
mapper.update: update employee_info set employee_name=#{employeeName}, employee_sex=#{employeeSex}, employee_phone={employeePhone}, employee_email=#{employeeEmail}, employee_idcard=#{employeeIdcard}, employee_address=#{employeeAddress}, photo=#{photo}, hiredate={hiredate}, isleave=#{isleave}, leave_date=#{leaveDate}, department_id=#{department.department_id}, position_id=#{position.position_id}, account_number_id=#{account_number.account_number_id} where employee_id=#{employeeId}
